title: Video: Eyedress – Everything We Touch Turns Into Gold
content:
Eyedress’ rather lovely self-titled debut EP managed to exist quite comfortably in the 2012, ‘post chill-wave world’, despite the obnoxiousness of the term and the very fact that no one truly knows what it even defines, a dangerous combination of factors.

The video for one of the record’s highlights, Everything We Touch Turns Into Gold, is a calmly glamorous insight into his world. It mourns greed, exuberance, beauty and apathy with a visual language that perhaps seems incidental, yet arguably still works.

The piece is directed by Julius Valledor and stars Alessandra de Rossi and Eyeless himself.

Download the EP HERE.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
